name: Timelapse Flight: Berlin to Frankfurt (Lufthansa A320)
description:
Timelapse full flight from Berlin to Frankfurt with Lufthansa, onboard an Airbus A320 operating flight LH179.

After push back and taxi out to runway 08R.  We lift off into a beautiful clear winter morning, making a right turn to get a fantastic view of snow-covered Berlin, with a great view of Tegel Airport and the former airport of Tempelhof.  We make a track south towards Frankfurt over a snow-covered Germany, climbing to a cruising altitude of 28,000ft for the short flight.  As we approach Frankfurt, the snow abruptly ends, and we make our approach for a smooth landing on runway 07L, before making our lengthy taxi into the terminal from the remote runway.  

Full video in real time is at https://youtu.be/4TeNjGtfdwM

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
